review 1.title: Eragon (Inheritance, Book 1)
review 1.author: Paolilni, Christopher
review 1.review_content: This book is the start to something great! This is hands down, one of the best series our there. Once I get started I can never stop. Amazing read.

review 2.title: Tress of the Emerald Sea
review 2.author: Sanderson, Brandon
review 2.review_content: They say the grass is greener on someones elses lawn, but when your reading this your grass is deffinitly greener. This book takes you to a magical world and has you trapped till the very last page.

review 3.title: Unbroken
review 3.author: Hillenbrand, Lauren
review 3.review_content: There's no other WWII memoir quite like this one. One of the best ones out there!
